distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for booth fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-3049: Fixed a vulnerability where a specially crafted hash can lead to invalid HMAC being accepted by Booth server. (bsc#1226032)
notes.title: Description of the patch

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Availability Extension 15 SP2

notes.text: A flaw was found in Booth, a cluster ticket manager. If a specially-crafted hash is passed to gcry_md_get_algo_dlen(), it may allow an invalid HMAC to be accepted by the Booth server.
notes.title: CVE description
